Attention to all, the Neo Beast Wars Events page has been updated, it is now 
cooler then ever since I learned Javascript.  I urge everyone to take a peek. 
    


<A HREF="http://nbwevents.tripod.com/nbwevents.html">Neo Beast Wars Events</A>
 

If anything out of the ordinary that Zardus or I should know, we have set up 
a special e-mail address:

KSLawDogg@... 

So please send all there.


Thanks.



Lord Unitron,
